title: No, a Congress MLA Did Not Praise Modi Govt for Demonetisation
subtitle: Viral video falsely claims Ex-BJP MLA as Congress MLA praising demonetisation
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: In this instance, a video of a political leader previously affiliated with the BJP was passed of as a leader of the Congress party going against the party line. Propaganda is on full swing on social media with elections around the corner in five states.
